@DelphiUniverse Maybe gathering some info before complaining that the game doesn't work would make you look less stupid, wouldn't it? Unpatched (without the 3dx mod), the game is restricted to a resolution of 1024x768 - a resolution that was sufficient when the game game out. I am sure you are using a higher one and thus get the "Cannot launch 3d engine" error. Ask auntie google for a solution next time and spare us from your silly remarks.

A follow-up to my previous post. 

- Search on the web for the following mod: SH3_Mod_DirectX9Res10
- Extract the files into the MAIN SH3 folder
- Edit the d3d9.cfg file to the desired resolution
- Change the resoltion of your monitor accordingly.
- Start the game and have fun :)

= ATTENTION =
The game is programmed for a 4:3 screen ratio, so you have to select such a resolution here (e.g. 1280x1025 etc). 
16:9 or 16:10 ratios will NOT work!!!
